Oscar, tiene 29 años de edad, reside en el Transito departamento de San Miguel con su mamá, es soltero, administra una tienda y una granja de pollos, estos negocios los comenzó gracias al apoyo de su mamá quien antes manejaba el negocio, trabaja en su propia casa, no tiene un horario establecido y actualmente necesita capital para invertir.
El ha solicitado un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de pollos, concentrado y en mercadería para surtir la tienda.
Esto le ayudara a crecer y fortalecer los negocios, lo que le permitirá atender mejor a los clientes.
Sus aspiraciones son crecer y ampliar la clientela y vivir en condiciones dignas con su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar is 29 years old and lives in El Transito in the department of San Miguel with his mom.  He is single and manages a store and a chicken farm.  He began those business thanks to the help of his mother who managed them before.  He works in his own home and doesn't have an established schedule.  Currently, he needs capital to invest.  

He has asked for a loan to invest in the purchase of chickens, chicken feed, and in merchandise to stock the store.  This will help him to grow and strengthen the businesses, which will allow him to better attend his customers.  

His dreams are to grow his clientele and to provide his family with the living conditions they deserve.

loans.use: To buy chickens and merchandise for the store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase supplies for producing snacks & fast food

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El contacto para el inicio del presente comité fue la señora Limpia A., quien invitó y organizó a sus amigas para formar parte del programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras.
La sra. Nidia C. se dedica a la costurería o confección, invirtió el dinero en la compra de elementos para su trabajo (tela, hilos, tijera, etc.), logrando obtener mayor variedad de prendas para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Las mujeres integrantes de este comité son luchadoras y desean prosperar, por ello, se reúnen cada semana para poder organizarse y ayudarse mutuamente tratando de alcanzar las metas, además de demostrar de esa manera su gratitud por el servicio a la Fundación Paraguaya.
texts.en:
Mrs. Limpia A. invited and organized her friends to be a part of the Committee for Enterprising Women.

Mrs. Nidia C. is a seamstress and will use the money to buy items for her work (fabric, threads, scissors, etc.), which allows her to have a greater variety of items to offer her customers.

The women who are part of this committee are hardworking and wish to get ahead, which is why they meet each week to be able to organize and help each other to meet their goals, they also want to show their gratitude for the service that Fundación Paraguaya (Kiva’s field partner) provides them.

loans.use: To buy scissors, fabrics and threads.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
El señor Juan Bautista C. H. tiene 34 años concubino con la Sra. Guillermina Arias Villca mas de 5 años tienen dos hijos menores viven en la comunidad de Pisly a 92 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba. 

El sr Juan es agricultor produce papa, papaliza, el necesita capital para comprar abono orgánico que en esta época los precios son baratos,  el sr. Juan es una persona humilde trabajadora y responsable, para él es muy difícil acudir a los Bancos de la ciudad que les piden muchos requisitos. Por eso se tuvo la iniciativa de ir a esa zona a otorgar crédito, el sr. Juan esta muy contento de haber conseguido un crédito, ahora va comprar el abono orgánico y tendrá lista para la siembra de esta año, así va tener ahorro para el estudio de sus hijos como también para mejorar la vivienda que es tan  precaria.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan Bautista C. H. is 34 years old and has lived with Sra. Guillermina Arias Villca for more than five years. They have two young children and live in the community of Pisly, which is 92km away from the city of Cochabamba.

Sr. Juan is a farmer who produces potatoes and other tubers. He needs capital to buy organic fertilizer since prices are low at the moment. Juan is a humble, hardworking, and responsible individual, but it is difficult for him to access loans from banks in the city because they have too many requirements. For this reason, he has taken the initiative to leave his district in order to apply for a loan.

Sr. Juan is very happy to have received this loan. Now he will be able to buy organic fertilizer so that he can be prepared for the next planting this year. Juan can now save for his children’s education and make home improvements that are overdue.

loans.use: Purchase organic fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Spare parts to repair his taxi

loans.name: Ada Cristela

texts.es:
Ada de 24 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 7, 4 y dos años de edad, ellos dependen económicamente, Ada se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, este negocio lo inicio por la ayuda que le brindo su madre en un inicio, no tiene un horario fijo ya que en su propia casa tiene la granja.
Actualmente necesita comprar cerdos por lo que solicita un préstamo, con los fondos piensa  adquirir cerdos y ampliar la granja.
La aspiración de ella es ampliar la granja y la clientela, obtener mejores ganancias y que las condiciones de vida de su familia sean mejores cada día.
texts.en:
Ada is 24 years old, she lives in San Rafael Oriente, department of San Miguel with her husband and three children of 7, 4, and 2 years of age who are dependent. Ada raises pigs, this business began with her mother’s help, she doesn’t have a fixed schedule since Ada has the farm in her home.

At present, Ada, needs the loan to buy pigs and plans to use the money to buy pigs and expand the farm.

Ada aspires to have a large farm and customers to have better earnings and that her family’s living conditions improve each day.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Saby

texts.es: Saby tiene 27 años, vive sola en una casa alquilada. Desde hace un año y medio empezó a trabajar de manera independiente en sus múltiples negocios, entre ellos vende frazadas, artículos para el hogar como ollas, asimismo se dedica a la organización de eventos sociales. Su método de venta es por medio de catálogos, así los clientes puede pedir con tiempo el producto o artículo que desea, y mas adelante cancelar la compra. Ella disfruta mucho realizar ambas actividades, ya que así puede ser independiente, sin embargo manifiesta que la única dificultad que tiene es cuando sus clientes no pagan a tiempo su cuotas, para lo cual ha sabido superarlas con estrategias de cobranzas, es por eso que su gran sueño es  tener más capital  para  que su negocio tengan mayor rentabilidad. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su grupo porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más mercadería, entre frazadas, sábanas y otros artículos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Saby is 27 years old and lives in a rented house. A year and a half ago, she started working independently in multiple businesses. These include selling blankets, household goods such as pots, as well as organizing social events. Saby sells her products through catalogs, which gives her customers time to choose the products and goods they want that they can pay for later. She enjoys both businesses and being able to work independently. However, Saby says her greatest difficulty is when her customers do not pay their bills on time. She has overcome this problem by enacting collection strategies. Her greatest wish is to have more capital so that her business will be more profitable.

This is her second loan with MFP. Saby is extremely happy to know that she has financial support, so she has always demonstrated responsibility with her payments. In addition, she is grateful to be part of her group because all the members are responsible and support people. She thanks those responsible for approving her loan request since the funds will be useful in advancing her businesses. The loan she requested will be used to by merchandise such as blankets, sheets, and other household goods.

loans.use: Purchase blankets, sheets, and other household goods

loans.name: Alcira

texts.es: La Sra. Alcira  de 37 años,  de estado civil casada, con 2 hijos, uno que se encuentra en edad escolar y la otra es pequeñita,  tiene ya varios años  haciendo  trabajar su micro ella percibe una renta diaria . La Sra.  Alcira  se dedica también a la venta de comida en su propio domicilio desde hace varios años. La Sra.  Alcira se vio en la necesidad de solicitar crédito de nuestra institución debido a la necesidad que tiene de mejorar las condiciones de su micro y así prestar mejor servicio al ciudadano, con el dinero del credito comprara material para tapizar asientos de su micro. Ella es cliente antigua de nuestra institución, con buen comportamiento de pago,  cuenta con domicilio conocido ubicado al  Sur de nuestra ciudad, es un persona muy responsable y trabajadora, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Alcira is 37 years old, married, and has two children. One child is of school age and the other is still small. For several years, Alcira has owned a mini-bus that generates daily rental income. She has also sold food from her home for the same length of time. Sra. Alcira is requesting a loan from Emprender because she needs to improve the conditions of her mini-bus so that she can provide better service to the public.

The money will be used to buy material for reupholstering the seats of her mini-bus. Alcira is a longtime client of Emprender and has demonstrated a good payment history. She has a home located south of the city. Alcira is a responsible and hardworking individual who is grateful to Emprender for its support.

loans.use: Purchase material to reupholster the seats of her mini-bus

loans.name: Aquilino

texts.es:
El señor Aquilino H. Q. tiene 53 años, vive solo con una sobrina que le ayuda en las faenas agrícolas y cuidado de ganado ellos está en la comunidad de Pisly,  están a 92 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, 
El sr. Aquilino es agricultor produce papa, papaliza, y tiene ganado vacuno, ovino. El necesita un capital para comprar abono orgánico el abono es barato y no tiene todavía ingresos económicos de la producción agrícola, el sr. Aquilino es una persona humilde trabajador y responsable, para él es muy difícil acudir a los Bancos de la ciudad que les piden muchos requisitos. Se tuvo la iniciativa de ir a esa zona a otorgar crédito.

El sr. Aquilino está muy contento de haber encontrado la institucion que le de el credito, porque con eso va comprar el abono orgánico oportunamente y tendrá lista para la siembra de este año, así va tener ahorro para ayudar el estudio de su sobrina, como también para mejorar la vivienda que habitan es muy precaria, construida de piedra y de techo de paja.
texts.en:
Aquilino H. Q. is 53 years old, and lives alone with a niece, who helps him with farming and caring for livestock.  They are in the community of Pisly, 92 km. from Cochabamba.  Aquilino is a farmer, raising potatoes, papaliza (palisa potatoes, or ulluscus tuberosus), and he has cattle and sheep.  He needs money to buy organic fertilizer.  Fertilizer is cheap, and he does not yet have the income from his crops.  Aquilino is a modest man, hard-working and reliable.  It is hard for him to go to the city’s banks, which have many requirements.  He took the initiative to come here for a loan.

Aquilino is pleased to have found the institution that will give him a loan, and is now going to buy organic fertilizer at the right time, to have it available for this year’s sowing.  This way, he will have savings to help with his niece’s studies, and to improve the housing where they live, which is precarious, made of stones with a straw roof.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer for farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a larger variety of flowers

loans.name: Mujeres Divinas Y Encantadoras Group

texts.es:
Dichas mujeres son de la compañía Pedrozo de la ciudad de Caacupe.
Las señoras están muy agradecidas con la Fundación Paraguaya porque gracias a las facilidades del crédito van a poder invertir y hacer crecer de ese modo sus negocios, generando mayores ingresos, que le ayudarán en un corto plazo a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
La presidenta, la Sra. Dora M., es una mujer muy trabajadora, madre de una hija que tiene la enfermedad de lupus, ella gracias a la oportunidad que le ofrece la fundación, con su facilidad de crédito y sus capacitaciones, va a poder invertir en su negocio de venta de leche, comprando las vacas que le faltan y los bidones, y de ese modo generar mayores ingresos para seguir solventando los gastos que requiere el tratamiento de su hija.
texts.en:
These women are from the Pedrozo company of the city of Caacupe.

The ladies are very grateful to the Fundación Paraguaya because thanks to them they were able to receive a loan that they will invest in and see their businesses grow, which will create more income that will help them improve their quality of life and that of their families.

The president, Mrs. Dora M., is a hardworking woman and mother to a girl who has lupus. She is grateful for the opportunity given by the foundation, since it is easy to acquire loans and the preparations given by them. Mrs. Dora will be able to invest in her business, selling milk, by buying cows and bottles, she will be able to have more income and use it to meet the expenses required for her daughters’ treatment.

loans.use: To buy bottles to store the milk and to buy dairy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase needed supplies for his agricultural work

loans.name: Sadith

texts.es: Sadith tiene 30 años, vive con su hija en casa de sus padres. Hace más de 2 años que se dedica a la venta de frazadas, negocio le ha sido de mucho provecho, puesto que ella trabaja en una fábrica de frazadas, entonces vio conveniente convertirse en un comerciante mayorista, además por que la empresa le deja estos productos a un precio básico, de esa manera lo vende a un precio más elevado, en consecuencia logra  generarse más ingresos. Por otro lado, se dedica también en la decoración para eventos sociales, por lo que actualmente se asocio con una amiga para  apoyarla en este trabajo. Su mayor prioridad es trabajar con ahínco, todo con el fin de brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su hija, quien es la que siempre la motiva, por ello desea en adelante incrementar su capital de trabajo. Es su cuarto crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su grupo porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de frazadas al por mayor.
texts.en:
Sadith is 30 years old and lives with her daughter in her parents' house.  For two years she has worked selling blankets, a business that has been a great help to her.  Sadith works in a blanket factory where her product can be acquired at a low price.  For this reason she saw fit to become a wholesaler.  She sells her product at a higher price, thereby earning more income.  Aside from this, she also works decorating for social events.  She is partnered with a friend who provides her with support in this job.  

Sadith's top priority is to work hard in order to provide a better quality of life for her daughter, who is always her motivation.  To further her objective, she wants to increase her working capital going forward.

This is Sadith's fourth loan with Kiva partner MFP.  She is very happy to have their financial support.  She has always been responsible in making her payments.  Also, she is grateful to be part of a group in which all of the members are responsible and supportive.  She gives thanks to those who will be managing the loan being requested; it will be very useful in advancing the business.  The loan proceeds will be used to purchase more blankets at wholesale prices.

loans.use: Stock up on blankets.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick K. M. is thirty-four years old, married to a businesswoman, and they have two children, ages seven and three, for whom they hope to provide a good education to the university level. 

His business is located at Kitengela and it is known by the name Lucky Fashion. He sells trouser suits, school uniforms, skirt suits and other clothing to the local people. He has been operating this business for nine years now and has two employees. He says that this business is profitable and the major challenge he has is financial constraints. However, he works very hard from early morning to late evening to keep his business doing well. 

He is using his loan of 80,000 KES to buy more clothes to grow his business and meet the demands of his customers. He also plans to buy a motorcycle to facilitate his movements while doing business. He hopes to expand his business, buy land and build. He describes himself as honest, punctual and visionary.

loans.use: To buy more clothing to sell and a motorcycle

loans.name: Perfecto

texts.es: El señor Perfecto es Chofer de taxi; el crédito lo quiere para comprar material de escritorio ya que su esposa tiene una librería y  una fotocopiadora. Estas dos actividades son sus principales fuentes de ingreso para la manutención de su familia.Vive  en casa Propia ubicada en la zona de Tacagua la ciudad de La Paz y  tiene un hijo. El cliente se siente satisfecho con los préstamos que le otorgamos. Esta es la primera vez que se canalizará uno de sus préstamos a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Perfecto is a taxi driver. The loan will be used to buy writing materials since his wife has a bookstore and a photocopier, and these are their main sources of income to support their family. Perfecto lives in his own house located in the Tacagua region of the city of La Paz and he has one son. He is satisfied with the loans he has been given. This is the first time that one of his loans has been channeled through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy writing materials for his wife's book store

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: El solicitante Luis Alberto N. C. tiene una moto taxi el cual es su herramienta de trabajo, vive con sus esposa y tiene una hija que  tiene seis años de edad su esposa Anabell Vilca Yallico trabaja de forma independiente  y le pagan de manera  semanal con ese ingreso ella ayuda  en los gastos de la casa ambos tienen experiencia crediticia  el préstamo que solicitaron  era para invertir en la construcción de su casa la cual fue cedido por su suegra. Ellos desean este préstamo para gastos personales ambos tienen buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y familiares.
texts.en: The petitioner is Luis Alberto N. C. he has a motorcycle taxi which is his work tool, he lives with his wife and has a daughter who is six years old and his wife, Anabell Vilca Yallico who works independently and is paid weekly with the money she helps meet the household expenses. Both have credit histories, and the loan that they requested is to be used to build their home which was given to them by a mother-in-law. They want to use the loan for personal expenses, and both have good references by their neighbors and family.

loans.use: Personal Expenses.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: La señora Nilda se dedica a elaborar masitas las mismas que las comercializa. El crédito lo necesita para la compra de materia prima como ser harina, azúcar, huevos y demás insumos necesarios para continuar con su negocio que es su principal fuente de ingreso para su manutención de su familia.Vive  en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Cotahuma de la ciudad de La Paz; tiene dos  hijos. La cliente se siente satisfecha con los préstamos que le otorgamos desde el año 2005.
texts.en: Nilda makes pastries similar to the ones sold in stores. The loan is needed to buy raw materials such as flour, sugar, eggs, and other supplies needed to sustain her business, which is the main source of income for supporting her family. She lives at home with her parents in the Catahuma area in the city of La Paz. She has two children. Nilda feels satisfied with the loans she has received since 2005.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs, and other supplies for her bakery

loans.name: Cirilo

texts.es:
El señor Cirilo A. C. tiene 38 años casado con la Sra. Jacinta Villca Apaza más de 18 años tienen 3 hijos menores viven en la comunidad de Pisly, a 92 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, el Sr Cirilo es agricultor produce papa, papaliza, oca y cría ganado vacuno necesitan capital para comprar abono orgánico en esta época el abono esta barato y ellos no tienen todavía ingresos económicos de la producción agrícola, el Sr. Cirilo es una persona humilde trabajador y responsable, para él es muy difícil acudir a los Bancos de la ciudad que les piden muchos requisitos. Se tuvo la iniciativa de ir a esa zona a otorgar crédito. 

El Sr. Cirilo está muy contento de haber conseguido un crédito,  ahora va comprar el abono orgánico oportunamente y tendrá lista para la siembra de esta año, va tener ahorro para el estudio de sus hijos como también para mejorar la vivienda su casa está construida de piedra y con techo de paja, la mayoría de los vecinos de la zona tienen construcciones precA. y son de piedras y techos de paja.
texts.en:
Cirilo A. C. is 38 years old, married to Jacinta Villca Apaza for more than 18 years.  They have 3 small children, and live in Pisly, 92 km. from Cochabama.  Cirilo is a farmer, growing potatoes, papaliza (a type of potato, ulluscus tuberosus), oca (a tuber, oxalis tuberosa), and raises cattle.  They need money to buy organic fertilizer.  Right now fertilizer is cheap, and they do not yet have the income from their farming.  Cirilo is a modest man, hard-working and reliable.  It is hard for him to go to the city’s banks, for they have many requirements.  He took the initiative to come here for a loan.

Cirilo is pleased to have secured a loan, and will now buy organic fertilizer at the right time, to be ready for sowing this year.  He will have savings for his children’s studies, and to improve his housing, which is made of stone with a straw roof.  Most people in the area have precarious dwellings, stone with straw roofs.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer for farming

loans.name: Gloria Etel

texts.es:
Doña Gloria, tiene 40 años D. edad, resiD. en Santa Elena departamento D. Usulután, su familia está conformada por su esposo y tres hijos D. 22, 18 y 12 años D. edad, su negocio es un comedor y pupuseria tambien posee una tienda donD. ofrecer variedades(peluches,bolsos, decoraciones), este negocio surge por la necesidad D. tener una fuente más para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, el horario D. venta es D. 7:00am a 7:00pm, actualmente necesita D. dinero para invertir en el negocio.
Por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar mercadería necesaria para el comedor y pupuseria, sería más en alimentos para preparar y los ingredientes necesarios para las pupusas. Esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar la atención a los clientes y prepara abundantes ventas.
Ella aspira mantenerse a largo plazo con el negocio, que sus clientes estén satisfechos por sus servicios y que a su familia no le falte lo necesario la alimentación y la salud.
texts.en:
Doña Gloria is 40 years old and lives in Santa Elena in the department of Usulután.  Her family is comprised of her husband and three children, ages 22, 18 and 12.  She runs a diner and "pupuseria" (tortilla stand) as well as a store where sells stuffed animals, purses and decorative items.  She started this business to help her husband with household expenses.  She opens from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m..  She is in need of funding for her business and therefore has requested a loan to buy ingredients for the diner and "pupuseria".

This investment will help her improve attention to customers and increase sales.  She hopes to be able to keep her business running for a long time, keep her customers satisfied and be able to proviD. everything her family may need in the way of proper nutrition and health.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her diner

loans.name: Mujeres Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres” nace mediante la gestión y el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar.
Este comité es de la Ciudad de San Lorenzo, se fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas, son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras.
La Sra. Celia N., presidenta del grupo tiene 35 años, ella está domiciliada en San Lorenzo, es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y por sobretodo muy optimista. Ella se dedica al corte y la confección, por eso desea invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de telas, tul, hilos, agujas y todos los materiales necesarios en su rubro.
texts.en:
The communal Bank “Women” was born with the support of another communal bank that was working in the same place.

This committee is from the city of San Lorenzo, and set as their main goal that each member will grow in their businesses. They are well-known in the area as hardworking women.

Mrs. Celia N. is the president of the group, she is 35 years old and lives in San Lorenzo, she is an enterprising woman, hardworking and above all a very optimistic person. She cuts and makes clothing and wishes to use the loan to buy fabrics, tulle, threads, needles, and all the materials needed for her work.

loans.use: To buy fabrics, appliqués for clothes, threads, tulle, etc.

loans.name: Asunta

texts.es: La Sra. Asunta de 43 años de edad  casada, con el Sr. Jose  tienen 3 hijos  que se encuentran estudiando, viven en casa propia en la zona parque Industria, la Sra.  Asunta tiene su tienda donde distribuye cerveza y refrescos  por mayor y menor se dedica al rubro  hace más de un año, su esposo es transportista, El dinero que solicitaron a la institución es para la compra de (refrescos por cantidad, sillas, Mesas, y vasos u otros), la Sra. Asunta desea ampliar su tienda ya que ella tiene muchos clientes que por la amabilidad con la que los atiende siempre le compran a ella sus productos .La clienta quedo muy agradecida por la confianza brindada en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
Asunta is 43 years old and married to Jose.  They have three children who are in school.  They live in their own home, which is located in an industrial park.  Asunta owns a store where she has sold beer and soft drinks at wholesale prices for more than a year.  Her husband works in transportation.  

The funds they are requesting are for purchasing soft drinks in bulk, chairs, tables, glasses and other items.  Asunta wants to expand her store to accomodate her many clients, who frequent her business and buy her products due to the kindness she always shows them.  Asunta is very grateful for the confidence demonstrated in granting her this loan.

loans.use: Purchase refreshments in bulk, chairs, tables, and glasses.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
El señor Tomas se dedica a la cría de ganado lechero  y es productor lechero; su esposa le ayuda con las actividades agrícolas. Con el dinero del crédito podrá comprar mas ganado (un par de vacas lecheras) para aumentar la producción de leche y sus ingresos.
Tomás tiene seis hijos;  esta actividad de producir leche es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para cubrir gastos de su familia. Vive  en casa  propia ubicada en la Localidad de Chojasivi en la Provincia Los Andes.
texts.en:
Tomas raises raises cows and produces milk. His wife helps him with these agricultural activities. With the money from the loan, he will be able to purchase more cattle (a pair of milk cows) to increase his milk production and his revenue.

Tomas has six children. Producing milk is the source of income that he has for covering his family's expenses. He lives in his own home located in the town of Chojasivi in the Province of Los Andes.

loans.use: Purchase a pair of milk cows to increase his milk production

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase rhinestones and thread

loans.name: Las Azucenas Group

texts.es: Doña Lucrecia E. P., tiene 27 años D. edad, cursos el sexto año del nivel primario, tiene 2 hijos, se dedica atender una tienda D. consumo diario, lleva 12 años D. experiencia con este negocio, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo que se dedica a servicios D. transporte. DeciD. organizar un grupo para solicitar un prestamos que servira para ampliar su capital D. trabajo, cada uno D. los integrantes D. este grupo se dedica al comercio, servicio D. tienda en general y servicio D. transporte. Doña lucrecia quiere tener un negocio surtido.
texts.en:
Lucrecia E. P., 27 years old, in her sixth year of school, has two children. She runs a general store. She has 12 years of experience in this business and relies on the support of her husband, who works in public transport. She decided to organize a group to apply for loans that would help to increase working capital. Each of the members of this group is in sales, running a store, or doing public transport. Lucrecia wants to stock her business.

**Translator's note: The group's name is "Las Azucenas," which means "The White Lilies."

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Ra´món Elías

texts.es:
Después de trabajar durante años como empleado en una ferretería, Ramón Elías M. V., decidió crear su propio negocio con lo aprendido en su oficio y con la ilusión de mejorar su calidad de vida. 

Fue entonces cuando con las ganas, sus manos y su conocimiento sumado a unos pocos ahorros inició su propia ferretería, ubicada en la Plaza de Mercadeo de Guarne, municipio al oriente de Antioquia-Colombia. Además de vender diferentes herramientas y artículos propios de dicho mercado, Ramón repara ollas a presión. 

Para ampliar su negocio y mejorar su servicio de reparación, este emprendedor necesita de un préstamo para comprar surtido y adquirir nuevas herramientas para reparar las ollas. En el futuro espera que su ferretería sea una de las más grandes y reconocidas en el municipio.
texts.en:
After working for years as an employee at a hardware shop, Ramón Elías M. V. decided to create his own business with what he learned at his trade and with the dream of improving his quality of life.   

It was then, that with his enthusiasm, his hands and his knowledge, he got together a few savings and started his own hardware store, located in the Plaza de Mercadeo in Guarne, a town located in eastern Antioquia, Colombia. Besides selling different tools and items in the market, Ramón repairs pressure cookers.   

To grow his business and improve his repair service, this enterprising man needs a loan to buy inventory and acquire new tools to repair the cookers. In the future, he hopes that his hardware store will be one of the biggest and most well known in town.

loans.use: To buy inventory and repair tools.

loans.name: Dinora Elizabeth

texts.es:
Dinora reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, tiene 30 años de edad, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, el negocio es la fuente de ingreso más estable con la que cuenta para comprar todo lo necesario para el hogar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar cerdos, ya que desea tener varios pequeños, pues cree que los que posee actualmente puede venderlos, y quedarse solamente con los pequeños.
Dinora quiere crecer con su comercio para recibir mejores ingresos y ayudar a sus hijos y su esposo para que tengan una vida confortable e ir adquiriendo más ahorros.
texts.en:
Dinora lives in San Rafael Oriente department of San Miguel, she raises pigs. She is 30 years old and lives with her husband and two children. The business is a steady source of income that they have to buy everything necessary for their home.

Dinora needs the loan to buy pigs since she wants to have several small ones, since she believes that the ones that she currently has she will be able to sell and will only have the small ones to take care of.

Dinora wants to grow her business to have better income and to help her children and husband so that they have a comfortable life and have some savings.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Cathy

texts.es: Cathy es una joven madre de 24 años, ella una hija de 2 años y juntas conviven en casa de su tía. Hace más de 2 años que posee una tienda, ahí vende productos de primera necesidad, motivo por el cual sus clientes siempre acuden a su establecimiento, adicionalmente también ofrece prendas de vestir de acuerdo a la temporada del año, dejando la mercadería a crédito. Por otro lado vende animales, actividad que lo realiza los fines de semana y con la ayuda de su tía, afirma que le agrada trabajar en su negocio porque le permite tener tiempo para atender a su hija. Por ahora su meta es tener una tienda grande con más mercadería y más capital para su negocio. Es su quinto crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería para su tienda.
texts.en: Cathy is a young 24 year old woman. She has a 2 year old daughter and they live together in her aunt's house. She has had a store for more than 2 years where she sells basic necessities. Her customers always go to her establishment for them. She also offers clothing according to the season, selling the merchandise on credit. She also sells animals, an activity she does on weekends with her aunt's help. She affirms that she likes to work in her business because it gives her time to attend to her daughter. For now, her goal is to have a big store with more merchandise and more capital for her business. this is hr fifth loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support, since she has always shown her self to be responsible with the payments. She is also very happy to be a part of her community bank because all of the members are responsible and very supportive people.  She is grateful to the people who will be lenders of the loan she is asking for because it will be very useful for her activity's progress. With the loan she is asking for, she will invest in buying more merchandise for her store.

loans.use: To outfit her store with more products.

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es: El señora María dedicada a la elaboración y producción de pan y empanadas ya hace un par de años atrás, esta actividad lo realiza en su domicilio, la producción y venta de sus productos  ya es conocida en su zona por realizar pan casero durante toda la semana, tiene ya muchos clientes, también reparte en algunas tiendas del lugar, empleando un pequeño horno domestico, el sueño de la señora es ampliar su negocio y contar con un horno mucho mas grande para producir mas pan y repartir a mucha mas gente, con el dinero del crédito la Sra. María comprara insumos e ingredientes para la elaboración de sus riquísimos panes y empanadas, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora con ganas de superación, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: María has made and produced bread and empanadas for a couple of years. She does this activity from her home, producing and selling her products. She is already known in her area for making homemade bread the whole week long. She already has a lot of customers and also distributes to some stores in the area. She uses a small non-commercial oven. Her dream is to grow her business and have a much bigger oven and produce more bread and distribute to a lot more people. With the money from the loan, María will buy materials and ingredients to make her delicious breads and empanadas. She is a very responsible and hardworking person who wants to get ahead. She is grateful to the institution for the support it has offered in granting the loan.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Jorge Adalberto

texts.es:
Jorge, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, tiene 27 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de videojuegos y una tienda donde ofrece artículos de primera necesidad, la familia de Jorge está conformada por su madre y una hermana, él es soltero; Este negocio comenzó por iniciativa propia, el horario es de 9:00am a 5:00pm, trabaja con la ayuda de un amigo y actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar videojuegos nuevos, maquinas y otros accesorios.
Esta inversión le ayudara a crecer en el negocio y a dar una mejor atención a los clientes ya que tendrá mercadería nueva. Él aspira tener este negocio cada vez más grande y aumentar la clientela, de esta manera espera ayudar económicamente a su madre y hermana, para que tengan una vida más cómoda.
texts.en:
Jorge lives in El Transito in the department of San Miguel.  He is 27 years old and has a business selling videogames and runs a general store.  His family is comprised of his mother and a sister.  He is single.  He began the business on his own initiative and works from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.  A friend of his helps him out.  He is requesting the loan to buy new videogames, machines and other accessories.

This loan will help him expand business and provide better customer service since he will have new merchandise.  He hopes to keep growing his business and customer base so he can help his mother and sister financially, providing them with a more comfortable lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy videogames, machines and accessories

loans.name: Fortaleza Group

texts.es:
"Fortaleza" es un comité  que está  en el tercer ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres de la Fundacion Paraguaya, cuenta con 18 integrantes.
La Sra. Elisa N. posee un pequeño puesto de venta de frutas al costado de la ruta  de San Lorenzo, ella va al mercado de abasto a comprar las frutas. Ella vende además jugos naturales y tiene clientela formada.
Con el ingreso que ella obtiene día a día ayuda a su marido, pero desea poder progresar y prosperar.
Es un comité donde las integrantes tienen  muchas ganas de superarse.
texts.en:
“Fortitude” is a committee that is in their third loan cycle with the women’s committee program of the Fundacion Paraguaya, they have 18 members.

Mrs. Elisa N. has a small fruit stall next to the San Lorenzo road; she goes to the supply market to buy her fruits. She also sells natural fruit juices and has a steady customer base.

With the earnings that Mrs. Elisa N. has each day she helps her husband but she wishes to progress and thrive.

This is a committee where the members are very enthusiastic about getting ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy fruits like oranges, pineapples, melon, apples, pears, etc.

loans.name: United Traders Association Group

texts.en:
Meet the members of the “United Traders Association” group from Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of 500,000 SLL for each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. 

Adama A. is the leader of this group. The 36-year-old is married to a teacher and they have two children. Adama has been a businesswoman for fourteen years now. She sells fish. With her share of this loan, she will buy a large quantity of fish to add to her business.

loans.use: To buy a large quantity of fish to add to her business

loans.name: Pedro William

texts.es:
Don Pedro de 43 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a vender ropa y medicina, vive con su familia su esposa e hijos de 12, 9, 8 y 5 años de edad, quienes dependen económicamente de él. 
El negocio lo aprendió trabajando en una comercial y luego decidió tener su propio negocio, no tiene un horario fijo pero ya maneja perfectamente las ventas por su experiencia en la actividad, por el momento necesita comprar mercadería para incrementar los productos con los que cuenta, a la vez agradar a los clientes por sus buenos productos.
La proyección de don Pedro con respecto al crédito es pagar puntualmente, en el negocio espera hacerlo crecer y montarlo en un lugar estable donde los clientes puedan llegar al momento que deseen.
texts.en:
Don Pedro is 43 years old and lives in San Rafael Oriente in the department of San Miguel.  He sells clothing and medicine and lives with his wife and children, ages 12, 9, 8 and 5, who are all financially dependent on him.

He learned his business while working as a sales representative for a company.  He later decided to set up his own business.  He has no fixed working hours but is very experienced in sales activity.  He currently needs to buy more merchandise to increase his inventory of products and meet customer demand for quality goods.

Pedro plans to pay back the loan on time.  He hopes to increase business and eventually set it up in a stable location so customers can go there whenever they like.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es: La señora Florencia se dedica a la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad en su domicilio, hace 2 años, tiene una tienda D. barrio donD. le va muy bien por la buena atención que le brinda a su clientes y también por la variedad D. productos que ofrece  y con esta actividad sustenta a su familia, su esposo se fue a España a buscar mejores oportunidades para la familia  y envía cada mes remesas para su sustento y también para la construcción D. sus casita,  la señora Florencia se hizo cargo D. su nieta ya que su hija  viajó a Argentina también en busca D. mejores oportunidades.  En la actualidad tiene un hijo que está a su cargo que se encuentra estudiando. Vive en casa propia hace 10 años, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora con ganas D. superación, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en: Florencia sells basic necessity products from her house. For 2 years she has had a neighborhood store and it is going very well for her because of the great service she gives her customers and also the variety of products she offers. She supports her family with this activity. Her husband went to Spain to seek better opportunities for the family and he sends remittances every month for support and also to build their little house. Florencia took over the care of her granddaughter since her daughter travelled to Argentina, also in search of better opportunities. At present, she has a son under her care who is in school.  She has lives in her own house for 10 years. She is a very responsible and hardworking person who wants to get ahead. She is grateful to the institution for the support it has offered in giving the loan.

loans.use: To buy groceries and improvements for the business

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica tiene 27 años, vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 2 hijos en una casa alquilada. Desde hace un año decidió con su esposo emprender un negocio independiente, debido a la  escasez de empleo que había y es así como iniciaron instalar un puesto de venta de comida, durante la semana, pero los fines de semana se dedica a vender animales en la feria ganadera de su ciudad. De esta manera llega a recaudar semanalmente dinero, que luego es administrado y utilizado para los gastos de su hogar. Durante este tiempo de trabajo ha sabido mejorar su trabajo y ofrecer lo mejor a sus clientes, ahora sus planes es mejorar la infraestructura de su puesto de venta, y con el tiempo tener su propia casa. Es su cuarto crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero y promete ser puntual en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en ambos negocios ya que comprará platos y tenedores descartables, así como también más carneros para incrementar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en: Angelica is 27 years old, she lives with her husband and 2 children in a rented home.  One year ago she and her husband decided to start their own business due to the scarce employment available.  They started selling food during the week at a shop and on the weekends selling animals at the cattle fair in their city.  This way they collect weekly income to use for household expenses.  Throughout this time they've learned to improve the work and offer the best to their clients.  Their plans now are to improve the shop's infrastructure and with time own their own home.  This is her 4th loan with MFP and she is happy to know she has financial backing and she promises to be punctual with payments.  She enjoys being part of her comunal bank because all of its members are responsible people and show solidarity.  She thanks those who will manage the loan she solicits because it will be useful to progress in her business.  With the loan requested, it will be invested in both businesses by purchasing disposable plates, forks, and also more rams to increase her working capital.

loans.use: Purchase disposable plates, forks, and also a ram.

loans.name: Yordy Rene

texts.es: El Sr. Yordy,  tiene como actividad la fabricación de peluches  hechos a mano,  como ser ositos, perritos y conejitos,  esta actividad la desarrolla artesanalmente en su hogar, el es una persona joven y emprendedora esta ocasión solicita crédito para comprar dos maquinas de cocer industriales para mejorar su producción y a la ves diversificar su actividad, de esta manera el ayuda a su familia que esta compuesta por el y su pequeña hija, su esposa se encuentra en el interior del país por esta razón el vive junto a su mamá, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora con ganas de superación, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito
texts.en:
Mr. Yordy makes hand-made stuffed animals such as teddy bears, puppies and bunny rabbits.  He produces his crafts in his home.  He is a hard-working, enterprising young man who plans to use the loan to buy two industrial sewing machines so he can improve production and diversify business.  This way he will be able to help his family which is comprised of his young daugther and his wife, who lives further inland, so he lives with his mother.

He is very responsible and earnest about getting ahead.  He is grateful to the institution for the support he has been given in the way of this loan.

loans.use: To buy two industrial sewing machines

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es:
Doña Marta, tiene 45 años D. edad, vive con su esposo y su hijo D. 26 años D. edad, residen en San Rafael Oriente departamento D. San Miguel, todos en su familia trabajan y por su parte doña Marta venD. ropa y medicina, trabaja en lo propio y no tiene horario fijo D. venta.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar ropa y medicamentos ya que a medida vaya invirtiendo en los productos que venD., así mismo el negocio caminara en busca D. tener un buen número D. clientes y atenderlos D. la mejor manera.
La aspiración D. doña Marta es ser vendedor mayorista y tener su propio local amplio.
texts.en:
Lady Marta is 45 years old, lives with her husband and 26 year old son, they live in San Rafael Oriente department of San Miguel, everyone in her family works including Marta who sells clothes and medicine, working on her own business without having a set schedule.  She is requesting a loan to buy clothes and medicine so that as she invests in the products she sells, the business will continue on to have a large number of customers and she can give them the best service possible.
Marta aspires to be a wholesale supplier and own a large commercial location.

loans.use: Buy clothing and medicine

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Tamaraneh Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the “Tamaraneh” group from Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. They are small-businesspeople who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, in order to ask for a loan of 500,000 SLL for each in the group. With this loan, they will be able to add more goods to their businesses, attract more customers, make more sales and profits and consequently improve on their living conditions. 

The leader of this group of entrepreneurs is Mohamed K.. Mohamed was born in Freetown about 33 years ago. He is married to a teacher and they have one child. Mohamed sells used clothes and has been managing this business for twelve years now. With his share of this loan, Mohamed is going to expand his business by buying a bale of used clothes to add to his current stock.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used clothes to add to his current stock

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: La Sra. Ana vive en la localidad de San José , es nacida en el departamento de Santa Cruz,  su esposo con el cual tiende un hijo es de ocupación chofer,  vive en la casa de su cuñada hace un año, su actividad es la venta de refresco, chicha y tortas y muy pronto preparara salteña, por este motivo solicito el crédito que será  destinado para comprar un horno para la elaboración de salteñas, hace un año que se dedica a esta actividad, sus ingresos de su esposo no era suficiente para sostener a su familia, por lo tanto ella  tiene que realizar esta actividad para apoyar la economía de su familia,  es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora con ganas de superación, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ana lives in the town of San José but was born in the department of Santa Cruz.  She lives with her husband, who is a driver, and her son in her sister-in-law's home, where they have been residing for one year.  Ana sells softdrinks, chicha (corn drink) and cakes.  Soon she will begin making meat pies and plans to use the loan she requested to buy an oven.

She's been running her business for a year now and helps with the household expenses since her husband's income is not enough to maintain the family.  She is very responsible and a hard worker who wants to get ahead.  She is grateful to the institution for the support she is receiving by way of this loan.

loans.use: To buy an oven

loans.name: Maria Elvira

texts.es:
Doña María de 65 años de edad, reside en El  Transito departamento de San Miguel, su negocio es la renta de locales, ella vive con un nieto ya que sus hijos formaron sus propios hogares, el negocio lo tiene hace 8 años, no tiene un horario fijo y por el momento tiene planes de remodelar las instalaciones.
Por lo que doña María solicita un préstamo para comprar pintura, accesorios y equipo, esta compra le será muy útil para mejorar las condiciones y la apariencia de las instalaciones, también estará mejorando la atención a la clientela.
Ella quiere tener los mejores locales, ser la atracción de los clientes y mantener en el negocio ya que es su fuente de ingreso.
texts.en:
Doña María is 65 years old and lives in El Transito in the department of San Miguel.  Her business is property rental.  She lives with her grandson since her children all have their own homes.  

She has been in business for 8 years, does not have a fixed work schedule and plans to renovate her property.  She needs a loan to buy paint, accessories and equipment in order to improve the conditions and appearance of her property, and to improve customer service.

She aspires to having more appealing property to attract customers and keep the business running, since it is her only source of income.

loans.use: To buy paint, accessories and equipment

loans.name: Reynaldo Magno

texts.es: El solicitante Reynaldo Magno P. Ramírez tiene una moto taxi el cual lo alquila aparte   tiene otro ingreso como producto de la  venta de zapallo en el mercado Toledo. El solicitante vive en casa de sus padres el cual será aval en el préstamo no cuenta con experiencia crediticia con otras entidades financieras .El prestatario esta solicitando el préstamo para comprarse otra moto taxi para alquilarlo y así le genere otros ingresos tiene buenas referencia  se caracteriza por ser una persona responsable es por ello que se propone el crédito.
texts.en: The petitioner is Reynaldo Magno P. Ramírez, he has a motorcycle taxi which he rents and besides that he has another job by selling gourd in the Toledo market. Reynaldo lives in his parents’ home which coincidentally is his guarantee for the loan since he doesn’t have any loan history with any other financial organizations. He needs the loan to to rent another motorcycle taxi to have more income. Reynaldo has good references and is characterized by being a responsible person which is why the loan is proposed.

loans.use: Work Capital

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El Sr. Julio tiene 52 años de edad, tiene tres hijos en edades de 23,21 y 18 años, quienes le ayudan en las actividades diarias, habitan en el Sector de Puerto Diaz en la Jurisdiccion de Juigalpa chontales; El Sr. P. se dedica a la astividad de la pezca en el lago de Puerto Diaz, sacando peces para comercializarlos en la Ciudad de Juigalpa y en el mismo puerto Diaz; es una persona seria en sus cosas, muy responsable y dedicado a su negocio, esta actividad le permite desarrollarse en el ambito economico de modo que obtiene sus ingresos para cumplir con sus compromisos de pago y los gastos del hogar, son una familia bien unida ya que sus hijos le ayudan en gran cantidad aportando sus mano de obra y los ingresos los comparten.  

Solicita su credito mediante el apoyo de Kiva para compra de Fardos los que ocupa para la pezca artesanal.
 
Su obtevido en la vida es que a sus hijos no les falte el pan de cada dia y que continuen como él en esta actividad para que lleguen a tener un patrimonio.
texts.en:
Mr. Julio is 52 years old and has three children, ages 23, 21 and 18 who help him with his daily activities.  They live in the Puerto Diaz sector in the jurisdiction of Juigalpa Chontales.  Mr. P. has a fishing business on Puerto Diaz lake.  He sells the fish in the city of Juigalpa and also at the Diaz port.  

He is a very serious, responsible man who is dedicated to his business.  His work has allowed him to develop financially and obtain income necessary to cover bills and household expenses.  He has a close-knit family and his sons not only help him in the business but also share their income.

He is requesting a loan through Kiva to buy equipment for his artisan fishing business.

His goal is to ensure his children have food on the table everyday and continue in the business so they can one day own assets.

loans.use: To buy fishing equipment

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth es una joven madre de 22 años, vive en una casa arrendada en compañía de su pequeño hijo. Tiene su tienda de abarrotes desde hace varios meses, todos los días se dedica en la atención y siempre esta al tanto de abastecerse oportunamente de la mercadería que esta por terminarse, además es de gran ayuda contar con proveedores que llevan los productos que solicitan a su tienda, de esta manera le ahorran tiempo y dinero ya que es ella la única persona que esta en su negocio. El esfuerzo que realiza esta motivada mujer es el de dar a su hijo lo mejor y estar al pendiente de ello ya que otro trabajo no le permite estar con él. En adelante quiere implementar con más variedad de  productos su establecimiento. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería en productos alimenticios envasados.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a young 22 year-old mother who lives with her small son in a rented house.  For several months she has been running a grocery store.  She is very careful about keeping it stocked well and depends on the collaboration of her suppliers who deliver the goods so she can save time and money, since she is the only person running the business.

The effort shown by this motivated woman stems from the fact that she wants to provide the best for her son and be able to stay abreast of his needs.  Another type of job would not allow her to be with him during the day. In the future she wants to expand her range of products.  

This is her second loan through MFP and she is very happy with the financial support given her.  She has always been responsible making her payments on time.  She enjoys being part of the communal bank because all the members are responsible and supportive.  She expresses her gratitude to the lenders who are helping her get ahead.  She plans to use the loan to buy more packaged food items.

loans.use: To buy more products for her general store

loans.name: Ara Poty Group

texts.es:
El presente comité se llama Ara Poty y se encuentra en su 4to. ciclo.
La Sra. Gasparina G. con 32 años, tiene 2 hijos y se dedica en la venta de cosméticos, por la mañana hace sus ventas por catálogos y se translada luego en moto en distintas ciudades, ya más tarde vuelve a su casa por la noche.
Es una señora muy sufrida que tiene un día a día muy pesado, porque al llegar de su trabajo debe realizar las tareas de la casa pero todo lo hace para salir adelante con sus hijos, ya que es madre soltera.
texts.en:
The committee is called Ara Poty and this is their fourth loan cycle.

Mrs. Gasparina G. is 32 years old, and has 2 children. She sells makeup. In the morning she makes her sales via catalog and later goes by motorcycle to different cities and arrives home in the evening.

Mrs. Gasparina G. has a very tough life since she has a very hectic day, because when she arrives home after work she has to do household work but she does everything to give her children a good start in life since she is a single mother.

loans.use: To buy makeup to resell.

loans.name: Unity Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, Northern Sierra Leone, is very pleased to present to you the members of the “Unity” group. These are small scale entrepreneurs who have come to the SMT/Kiva lenders to ask for a loan of 500,000 SLL each in order to invest in their businesses. 

Fatmata B. is the leader of this group. She is 23 years old and married with two children. She sells rice, and has been a businesswoman for fifteen good years. With the help of this loan, Fatmata will invest in her business by buying more bags of rice to resell.

loans.use: To buy more bags of rice to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a calf.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 22 years old, single, and very hardworking. She owns a shop in which she sells several items such as matches and some food items. She has managed this business for four years .Esther is requesting a loan in order to buy more items to fill her store. She plans to reinvest the profits in her business.

loans.use: To buy more items to fill her store.

loans.name: Sergio Alberto

texts.es:
Sergio de 31 años de edad, reside en Concepción Batres departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 2 y 1 año de edad, el negocio de Sergio es un taller de enderezado y pintura de automóviles, dicho taller lo inicio hace 5 años aprendiendo el oficio por el desempeño como empleado de varios talleres, tiene dos empleados.
El solicita un préstamo por que necesita comprar repuestos y herramientas, las cuales no puede adquirir por la falta de recursos, al obtener este préstamo su taller contara con herramientas en buen estado y repuestos para realizar los trabajos solicitados por los clientes.
Sergio espera fortalecer el negocio con esta inversión y atender a más clientela, viviendo en mejores condiciones con su familia y que sus hijos en un futuro puedan ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Sergio is 31 years old, and he lives in Concepción Batres department of Usulután with his wife and two children who are 2 and 1 year olds. Sergio’s business shop straightening/repairing and painting cars, he started the shop 5 years ago by learning the trade by working in various workshops. Currently he has two employees.

Sergio needs the loan to buy spare parts and tools that he hasn’t been able to buy by lack of resources. With the loan he will be able to bring to his workshop tools in good condition and the spare parts to do the work needed by his customers.

Sergio hopes to improve his business with this investment and to take care of more customers, to live in better conditions with his family and that his children have a future and become professionals.

loans.use: To buy spare parts and tools.

loans.name: Mary Cristina

texts.es:
Mary Cristina Barón Q. empezó su panadería al lado de su familia, pues después de que su padre trabajara durante años en una mina de carbón y después de sufrir una tragedia en la que murieron muchos de sus compañeros decidieron emprender un camino difrente para salir adelante y superar las dificultades. 

Fu entonces cuando Mary en compañía de su padre y su madre se dedicaron a este oficio, el cual aprendieron para cubrir los gastos familiares. De domingo a domingo esta constante familia se dedica a hacer panes, galletas y otros productos  propios de la panadería. 

Actualmente, necesitan de un préstamo para comprar insumos, así aumentarán la producción e irán creciendo poco a poco hasta convertirse en una gran panadería.
texts.en:
Mary Cristina Barón Q. began her bakery business together with her family.  After her father had worked for several years as a coal miner and suffered through a tragedy in which many of his co-workers were killed, the family decided to go a different route to get ahead and surmount their difficulties.  

That's when Mary and her parents decided to learn how to run a bakery to cover household expenses. From Sunday to Sunday this indefatigable family works making bread, cookies and other baked goods.  

They plan to use the loan to buy ingredients so they can increase production and grow into an even bigger bakery.

loans.use: To buy bakery ingredients

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.en: Jean Claude, a 31-year-old father of two children aged four and five years old, owns a restaurant serving African dishes. He is requesting a loan in order to buy more foodstuffs for his restaurant, and with the profits he plans to feed his family.

loans.use: To buy foodstuffs for his restaurant.

loans.name: Alma Ruth

texts.es:
La Sra. Alma A. es comerciante y su actividad principal es la venta de cosméticos, su producto lo vende de manera ambulante en la aldea de Jutiapa, aldeas y caseríos cercanos a la misma,  tambien cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes en la ciudad de danlí.
Doña Alma tiene varios años de dedicarse a este tipo de negocio y es notable que durante este tiempo lo ha sabido administrar, en las compañías a quien les compra el producto, Alma esta en categoría de vendedora  LLUVIA DE ESTRELLAS por ser vendedora mayorista,  pero en varias ocasiones para alcanzar lo máximo en ventas y aprovechar las ofertas que vienen en los catálogos  compra el producto para luego revenderlo a precio normal y esto le genera mayores ganancias.
Alma es madre soltera y tiene un niño, el cual esta cursando sus estudios secundarios y es ella la que cubre con todos los gastos de su hogar.
Doña Alma sale todos los días muy de mañana a ofrecer el producto haciendo su regreso en horas de la tarde noche a su casa de habitación.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Alma A. is a merchant whose main activity is selling cosmetics in the village of Jutiapa and throughout the nearby villages and rural areas.  She also has many customers in the city of Danlí.

Doña Alma has been involved in her work for several years and has been a very good manager.  She is listed among her suppliers in the STAR wholesale category.  Many times she reaches the maximum sales volume by purchasing large quantities of discount catalogue products which she later sells at normal prices in order to generate more income.

Alma  is a single mother and has a son in secondary school.  She is responsible for covering all the household expenses.  Every morning she leaves the house early to go to work selling her products, not returning home until late in the evening.  She plans to use the loan to buy merchandise.

loans.use: To buy deodorant, creams, body oil, lotions, perfume, lipstick, nail polish

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For colored paper and glue.

loans.name: Napoleon

texts.es:
Don Napoleón reside en Santa Elena, departamento de Usulután, tiene 51 años de edad, vive con su esposa y trabajan juntos en la venta de granos básicos, no tienen un horario fijo para atender el negocio, y por el momento quiere compra mercadería para aumentar el inventario.
El está solicitando un préstamo para comprar mercadería (arroz, frijoles, café), ya que quieren tener suficiente para un largo periodo, esperando que las ventas sean buenas y puedan dar salida a todo el producto que van a adquirir.
Don Napoleón quiere continuar trabajando para aumentar cada día el negocio, la clientela y las ganancias.
texts.en:
Don Napoleón lives in Santa Elena, department of Usulután; he is 51 years old and lives with his wife. They work together selling basic grains, they don’t have a set schedule in their business and for the moment he wants to buy merchandize to increase the inventory.

He needs the loan to buy merchandize (rice, beans, coffee), since they want to have enough for a long time and hopes that sales are good and they can sell every product they acquire.

Don Napoleón wants to continue working to improve each day his business, customers and his earnings.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans and coffee.

loans.name: Josefa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Josefa casada, su familia es humilde y trabajadora, su esposo le apoya con la comercialización del producto que se cosecha, también sus hijos le apoya al trabajar en el campo, mejorar el servicio de agua potable es unos de sus planes. Agricultora, desde muy joven inicio a trabajar en el campo y con el apoyo de la reforma agraria empezó a sembrar. Su objetivo es diversificar la finca así obteniendo mayor producción.
Con el préstamo que solicitad comprara Insumos y fertilizante para aplicarle a la tierra, mejorar la producción, producir mayores y con mejor calidad.
Gracias al financiamiento lograra una cosecha que obtendrá ganancia y a su vez invertirla en la finca, mejorando su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Josefa is married, her family is humble and hardworking, and her husband helps her to sell the products that they harvest as well as their children by working the fields. One of her plans is to improve her drinking-water. Josefa has been a farmer from a very young age by working in the fields and with the support of the agrarian reform she began to plant her crops. Her goal is to diversify the ranch to have more production.

With the loan she plans to buy materials and fertilizer to use on the land, improve production and have greater and better crops.

Thanks to the loan she will be able to have a harvest that will give her profits that she will invest in the farm and will improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy materials and fertilizers.

loans.name: Rosa Mariela

texts.es:
Rosa es una madre de familia de 32 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a su hijo en el caserío El Carbón del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores y aves de corral, ella cría gallinas, patos, pavos y  también cerdos en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Esta actividad la realiza hace más de tres años, cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona. 

Rosa desea adquirir alimento balanceado para sus animales con la finalidad de obtener animales con más tamaño y buen peso que le permitirá venderlos a un buen precio incrementando por supuesto su ganancia. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 32 year old mother.  She lives with her husband and her son in the El Carbón settlement in the agricultural district of Tambogrande.  It is an agricultural zone situated in the Piura region, which is over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

She raises and sells small animals and poultry.  She raises chickens, ducks, and turkeys.  She also raises pigs in back of her house.  When they have reached a good level of development, she sells them to the businessmen who usually visit the zone where she lives.  She has been doing this for over three years, and she has established customers in her zone.

Rosa wants to get balanced feed for her animals so that they will be bigger and of a good weight.  This will allow her to sell them for a good price, which, of course, will increase her earnings.  That is why she believes it is advisable to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan for 1,200 soles.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed

loans.name: Liberto De Jesús

texts.es:
La falta de oportunidades, los escasos recursos de su familia y las ganas de superarse, obligaron a Liberto de Jesús Q. Q. a trabajar desde los 8 años de edad cuando apenas era un niño, empezó vendiendo frutas en el parque del municipio de donde es oriundo y después siendo aun joven decidió buscar otras alternativas y viajó a Medellín-Colombia para continuar su lucha. 

Con los pocos ahorros que tenía montó una carnicería pero ya trabajando empezó a consumir alcohol desmedidamente, situación que lo afectó en todos los aspectos de su vida, fue entonces cuando decidió buscar empleo en una empresa para disciplinarse y tratar de dejar a un lado esta dependencia. Durante 8 años trabajo como empleado y logró superar esta dificultad que como el mismo lo afirma son situaciones para crecer como personas. 

Su vena emprendedora continuaba latente y fue entonces cuando decidió crear nuevamente su propio negocio, ahora una tienda de productos de la canasta familiar se convirtió en su sustento y en el de su familia. 

Actualmente, Liberto necesita de un préstamo para la compra de diferentes productos ya que el dinero que tenía destinado para tal fin lo invirtió en la reparación de un enfriador.
texts.en:
The lack of opportunities, his family's scarce resources, and his desire to get ahead have obligated Liberto de Jesús Q. Q. to work since he was 8 years old and just a child. He began by selling fruit in the park of his native city, and later when he was still a youth, he decided to seek other opportunities, and he traveled to Medellin, Colombia, to continue his struggle. 

With the small savings he had, he set up a butcher shop, but after he started working, he began to drink too much alcohol, a situation which affected all areas of his life. It was then that he decided to seek work with a company, so he could gain self-discipline and leave his dependency behind. For 8 years, he worked as an employee, and he was able to overcome this difficulty, which, as he himself affirms, is the kind of situation that allows people to grow as individuals.  

His entrepreneurial spirit was still latent within him, and he next decided to start his own business again: this time a general store with household necessities, which has become the source of sustenance for himself and his family. 

Currently, Liberto needs a loan to buy various products, since the money he had set aside for this purpose had to be invested in repairing a refrigeration unit.

loans.use: Buying merchandise

loans.name: Jose Valentin

texts.es:
Don José de 53 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, es agricultor y también le gusta la ganadería, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 20 y 18 años de edad, dependen aun económicamente. El negocio lo tiene hace varios años ya que desde joven se dedico a las labores agropecuarias donde aprendió perfectamente, lo cual lo animo a continuar con estas actividades para llevar los ingresos al hogar y cubrir las necesidades.
El está solicitando un préstamo para comprar abono, semilla y fertilizantes, pues quiere realizar la siembra en este tiempo y no tiene los materiales necesarios, él espera con esta compra poder sembrar y recoger una buena cosecha.
Don José tiene como objetivo velar por las necesidades de su hogar, trabajar fuertemente cada día para lograrlo y en un futuro tener mejores comodidades.
texts.en:
Don José is 53 years old and lives in San Rafael Oriente, department of San Miguel. He is a farmer and also enjoys cattle raising. He lives with his wife and two children of 20 and 18 years of age, they still depend on him financially. Don José has had his business for many years, since he was young he has been involved in farming and stockbreeding where he learned perfectly the trade and it encouraged him to continue the work to bring money home and to meet his families’ needs.

Don José needs the loan to buy manure, seeds, and fertilizers since he wants to sow his crops during this time and does not have the necessary materials. He hopes that with these purchases he will be able plant and have a good harvest.

Don José has as an objective, to watch over the needs of his home, he does this by working hard each day to achieve his goal and in the future to have better things in life.

loans.use: To buy manure, seeds, and fertilizers.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Help We Self Group

texts.en:
Memuna B. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Born 28 years ago in Kenema city, Memuna is married and has two children. For five years now, Memuna has been selling used clothes and will use her share of the loan (SLL 500,000) to expand her enterprise through the purchase of another bale of used clothes.

This is the first loan that Memuna and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used clothes to add to her business

loans.name: Evelyne

texts.en: Evelyne, a hard-working mother of three schoolchildren ranging in age from 4 - 12 years, sells agricultural medicine, i.e., medicine for both animals and plants. Evelyne is requesting a loan to buy more medicine, and plans to combine the additional profits with her savings to begin building a house.

loans.use: To buy additional inventory of animal and plant medicines

loans.name: Bayardo Enrique

texts.es:
Bayardo casado, hombre trabajador y responsable, todos sus hijos ya son mayores de edad, mejorar su condiciones de vida actual es una de sus prioridades, agricultor desde hace un gran tiempo, ha tenido problema de sequia en la finca, inicio a cosechar en sus tierra con el apoyo de la reforma agraria. 
Planes para su finca mejorar los suelos con la incorporación de abonos verdes.
El préstamo será invertido en la compra  de insumos y fertilizantes que será aplicado debidamente al suelo antes de iniciar a sembrar.
texts.en:
Bayardo is a married, hardworking and responsible man; all of his children are of age. One of his priorities is to improve his quality of life. Bayardo has been a farmer for a very long time and has had drought on his ranch and he began to harvest his land by the support of agrarian reform.

Bayardo’s plans for his ranch include improving his soil by using green fertilizers.

The loan will be used to buy materials and fertilizers to be used on the soil before he begins to sow his crops.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Adjowa

texts.fr: Madame  Adjowa est  mariée  et  a  38 ans.  Elle  est  dans son cinquième  cycle  de  prêt.  En  effet,  elle  fait  le commerce  de  biscuits.  Elle a commencé en  1996  cette  activité.  Elle achète les ingrédients  au grand marché  de  Lomé  et  revend  après  préparation  à côté  de  CMS  de  Baguida. Elle sollicite  de Wages  un prêt  pour  acheter  2 sacs  de  farine  de  blée, 2 sacs  de  sucre  et  levures.
texts.en: Mrs. Adjowa is a 38 year-old married woman. This is her fifth loan. She has a business selling cookies which she started in 1996. She buys her ingredients in the Lomé Grand Market and after making the cookies, sells them next to the Baguida CMS (Medical-Social Service Center) . She is requesting a loan from Wages to buy 2 bags of wheat flour, 2 bags of sugar and yeast.

loans.use: To buy wheat flour, sugar and yeast.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 26 years old. She has two children who are ages 4 and 7 years. She is a widow. 

Christine sells beer; she has done this business for 10 years. Christine is requesting a loan in order to buy more beer, and with the profits, she hopes to meet her family's needs.

loans.use: To buy additional inventory of beer

loans.name: Rafaela

texts.es:
Rafaela casada, mujer trabajadora, su esposo de professión albañil, tiene dos hijos menores de edad. Su proyecto mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda que están en malas condiciones dándole a sus familia un mejor bienestar, agricultura desde muy joven de edad inicio a cosechar la tierra y con apoyo del suegro que le brindo los conocimientos necesario para el mantenimiento. Ha logrado tener su finca  con producción de piña. 
Sus planes son mejorar los cultivos con la aplicación de fertilizantes, para tener una mayor producción, coloración y sabor  de piña.
texts.en: Rafaela is married,  she is a hardworking woman, her husband is a construction worker and she has two young children.  Her project is the betterment of her home's infrastructure which is in bad condition so that she can give her family a better life. As a farmer from a young age she started working the land and with the support of her father in law who gave her the necessary know-how for maintenance of the land.  She was able to have her own pineapple farm.  Her plans are to improve her land with fertilizer to have a better production, color and taste from the pineapple.

loans.use: Buy fertilizer

loans.name: Dathive

texts.en: Dathive is 40 years old, and she has one child who is 18 years old. Dathive sells foodstuffs and she is requesting a loan to purchase more inventory. She wishes to renovate her house with the profits she plans to make.
